body.name: NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Shave Gel with Aloe Vera and Provitamin B5, 3 Pack of 7 Oz Cans
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.

features: Cares for and Hydrates Skin: This NIVEA MEN shaving gel cares for and hydrates skin while shaving
Fights Shaving Irritation: This beard shaving gel helps to protect against dry skin and irritations from shaving
Improves Razor Glide: A men's shave gel that improves razor glide and softens the stubble for a comfortable, close shave
Aloe Vera and Provitamin B5 Enriched: NIVEA shaving gel for men enriched with Aloe Vera, Provitamin B5 and other moisturizers to replenish the skin's moisture
Includes three (3) 7 ounce cans of NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Shave Gel
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Shave Gel. This shave gel is specially formulated for men, to care for and hydrate skin while shaving. NIVEA Maximum Hydration Shave Gel for Men is enriched with Aloe Vera, Provitamin B5 and other moisturizers for skin that looks healthy and smooth. Great as an alternative to shaving cream, the ultra-rich NIVEA shave gel for men is formulated to leave skin feeling comfortable and hydrated, and help you feel good in your skin. Featuring Skin Guard Technology, this NIVEA shave gel improves razor glide to help protect against micro cuts and shaving irritation. It also helps to protect against dry skin and softens stubble for a comfortable, close shave. This aloe vera shaving gel is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Face Wash, Face Moisturizer and Post Shave Balm. To use, pump men's shaving gel onto fingertips and massage directly onto face to form a rich, creamy lather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for men with sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: Husband is pleased with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nivea makes the chore of shaving easier.
reviews.reviewText: Don't look for any magic words here. Shaving, as I said, can be a chore. Every day. Am a blade shaver who has tried power shavers without the kind of results I would like. Found sensitive skin Nivea and it helps. Keep looking for the "magic" razor or again trying the electric razors, but am sold on Nivea. And this choice is personal to myself. Can I recommend it? Yes. It's worth a try if you are dissatisfied with your shave foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Got the Nivea Blue shaving cream only because my usual shaving cream, Nivea Deep Black escalated in price to $25 for 3 cans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've used Nivea products for years. Their after shave "balm" is so soft and smooth, that I never used any other after shaves that sting or burn again. The "balm" is the after shave, in other words. But, for this product of Nivea shaving gel cream, it's the softest shave I've had after using many different products with trial and error for years. This gel foams so easily once rubbed in your hands. Whether it's an electric razor, a thin beard!a+, metal razor, or any other product, combined, the use of these two Nivea products will keep your face from having knicks or small cuts on it. I mean, I've gotten to the point now where I haven't received any minor cuts at all. Both products seem oily upon application, but dry within 5-minutes after full wash off. Or, just dab it with a towel after you're Done and ready!NOTE: This is NOT a thin cream. It shouldn't be used as one or used in place of a cream. Overall, I give this shaving gel a letter grade of A- only because no product is perfect. Amazon has maniacal reviewers, so, I'm keeping this review as objective (as possible). My number ratio rating is an 8/1!0 Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best among all the other Shaving Gels
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend, number one choice for me. For a long time these NIVEA Gels were impossible to get in the US. Thank to Amazon now we can buy them again!
